lines.text: You have made it publicly obvious that you have only one concept of love... a vile and sinful one.
When you're dying of thirst, you drink from a mudhole.
You have devoted your life to mud and filth.
Only to get even with you.
You're not a woman, you're a disease!

[receiving the advances of her drunken husband]
You're not the first today, I'm just getting warmed up!
Dani stabbed him in the stomach with one of her mother's sculpting chisels. He lived about three minutes. Painfully.
Valerie screamed. Dani rushed to her defense, picking up the first weapon she could find. She swung wildly - and hit a home run.
When you're dying from thirst, you'll drink from a mudhole.
Somewhere along the line the world has lost all its standards and all its tastes!
